column1: send_gold_desc;Send Gold to §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!. You can choose from 6 different amounts.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
desc_send_gold.1;§GChoose§! amount of gold to send. The gold amounts you can send are §G25§!

column2: for far too long have I grown powerful while your own realm has stagnated. Please accept this small token of §Y[FROM.gold_given.GetValue]§! gold coins as reward for still existing. From your biggest rival \nLove §Y[gold_giver.GetFullName]§!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Tooltip_not_already_open;Send Gold interaction not already open;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
open_employment_desc;View a list of potential Retainers;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
close_employment_desc;Close the list of potential Retainers;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

make_first_wife_desc;If you wish you can promote [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to your first wife. Your current first wife will be unhappy about it and may scheme to regain her old position.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
correct_dynasty_desc;There are times where for no apparent reason CK2 will not make a child of your bloodline
column3: even if you've made arrangements for your children to be of your bloodline. This will pull them back into your bloodline

column1: adept_continence_desc;You may adapt sexual abstinence as your state of life. No longer possible to visit bedchambers of your wife.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unadept_continence_desc;Sexual restraint is no longer your state of life.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
add_chastity_belt_desc;Why trust that §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be chaste on [Root.GetHerHis] own when you can guarantee [Root.GetHerHis] sanctity?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
remove_chastity_belt_desc;Is it time to remove [§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s chastity belt and leave [Root.GetHerHim] subject to [Root.GetHerHis] own desires?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
chastity_belt_desc;This belt will help this young lady stay true to her virtue in ways that she might not have been able to
continence_desc;The exercise of self constraint in sexual matters;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
